document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Naqus River on the Golden Gulf.
document_data.name: Al-Naqus River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Naqus River''', also called the '''River of Peril''', was a waterway found in the northwest region of the [[Cities of the Pantheon]] in [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: The river originated in the foothills of [[Al-Sayaj Mountains]]. It flowed west then northwest before meeting the [[Golden Gulf]]. The city of [[Fahhas]] was founded along its western bank on the gulf.
